name: RSS News Scroller
author: Vimal Ghorecha

sections.description:
RSS News Scroller simple and lightweight news scroller which you can use by just activating it. Classic jQuery 3D scrolling effect attract user to read news from Feed.

Features

  • News Scroller with RSS
  • Cube Effect
  • Scrolling Effects settings
  • Widget

Comming Soon

  • Multiple RSS Feeds
  • Tell me your ideas

If you have suggestions for a new add-on, feel free to email me at admin@vhghorecha.in.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin by going to the RSS News Scroller menu that appears in your admin menu
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with contact me on
RSS News Scroller

short_description: RSS News Scroller is a simple WordPress plugin to create a list of news with images from RSS feed and display it in marquee
